reg_pit.title:
British Columbia Milk Marketing
Board Regulation

change.changenote: Section 3 (2) (c) BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 112/2014, effective June 18, 2014.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for the period ending July 3, 2005, the member under subsection (1) (c) is Blaine Gorrell of Chilliwack, B.C..

change.changenote: Section 4 (2) (a) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 211/2015, effective November 28, 2016.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: elect as auditor, a person who meets the requirements of sectionÂ 42 of the Society Act, for the purpose of auditing the books of account and affairs of the board, and

change.changenote: Section 9 (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 4/2010, effective January 14, 2010.

subsection.subsectiontext: A review under subsection (1) must be conducted by the board in consultation with the Milk Industry Advisory Committee, the British Columbia Farm Industry Review Board and the Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Fisheries.
